summary: Partner onboarding and customer booking app updates: add validated phone/email inputs with mock OTP verification, PIN-code based service areas, improved availability/booking date rules, header navigation updates, and a My Profile area with completion percentage and eyewear preferences.
architectural_notes: OTP verification will be implemented as a mock/simulated flow (no real SMS/email integrations).

existing_features.title: Update the "Become a Provider" (partner onboarding) form to collect phone and email as separate inputs (instead of a single combined contact field), and require the user to verify both using a mock OTP flow before allowing submission.

Update the "Become a Provider" (partner onboarding) Service Areas input to accept 6-digit Indian PIN codes, allowing multiple PIN codes separated by exactly one space, and validate this format before submission.

Make provider "Availability" mandatory on the "Become a Provider" page and replace the free-text availability field with a calendar-based selector that supports selecting individual dates or a date range, disallows past dates, and supports selecting a daily time range (fromâ€“to).
Update the "Request Repair Service" booking form to disallow selecting past dates and remove time selection (date-only), while keeping the field optional.
Update the "Book Mobile Optician" booking form to disallow selecting past dates and remove time selection (date-only), while keeping the field optional.

Update the site header navigation: remove "Provider Portal" and replace it with "Contact Us" that provides a WhatsApp action for +91 8600044322 and an email action for info@eyegic.com (including an icon for WhatsApp).

Add a "My Profile" area accessible from the header that lets the logged-in user view/edit optional profile fields (name, age, gender, address), upload a profile picture, upload a prescription picture, select one or more eyewear frame shape preferences (with a small icon next to each shape name), and show a profile completion percentage.

Apply a cohesive, consistent visual theme to the updated/new UI surfaces (provider onboarding updates, booking date inputs, header changes, and My Profile) using a distinct style direction that is not blue/purple, with consistent spacing, typography, and validation/feedback styling.

new_feature_requests.summary: Become a Partner page: separate phone/email inputs with 10-digit phone validation and mock OTP verification flows (4-digit OTP for SMS + email verify button/OTP entry).
Become a Partner page: service areas input accepts 6-digit Indian postal codes, multiple entries separated by single spaces.
Become a Partner page: mandatory availability calendar with selectable dates/date range (no past dates) and time range selection (from-to).
Request Repair Service tab: disallow selecting past dates; remove time selection.
Book Mobile Optician tab: disallow selecting past dates; remove time selection.
Header update: replace Provider Portal with Contact Us linking to WhatsApp (8600044322) and email (info@eyegic.com).

Add My Profile section: optional details (name, age, gender, address), profile picture upload, prescription upload, frame-shape preferences (multi-select, ideally with shape icons), and profile completion percentage.
